scripts.theme:dev: env-cmd -r shopify.presets.json -e development shopify theme dev
scripts.download: env-cmd -r shopify.presets.json -e development shopify theme pull
scripts.download:prod: env-cmd -r shopify.presets.json -e production shopify theme pull
scripts.deploy: env-cmd -r shopify.presets.json -e development shopify theme push
scripts.deploy:prod: env-cmd -r shopify.presets.json -e production shopify theme push
